entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git cd devops-deployment sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/stm-visualize.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/stm-visualize@sha256:979522aace49e6003fe688b5a0faef4a9cf45e9e72302705167339b2bb7acca6+g' ./visualize-thp/master/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./visualize-thp/master/.argocd-source.yaml for file in ./visualize-thp/master/deploy*.yaml; do sed -i "s/\(date:\s*\)'[^']*'/\1'1677733294'/" "$file";git add "$file";done git commit -m 'Done by Jenkins Job changemanifest: stm-visualize:12' git push https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git HEAD:refs/heads/master
